Description

Have you been subjected to a lifetime of mass media mainstream crap? This is the true to life aftermath of one man&#039;s contribution and reaction to the dull onslaught currently enslaving the human condition. Overlook the Ambush was recorded between Feb 05 and Feb 06 in SE Portland, in a moldy basement and condemned warehouse. Featuring advanced time-shifting and light-emitting tunes such as Bad Data, Sign3113, and Greasin, The listener will be put through it all with no room for error. MLIOTTA is not of the ordinary and neither is this release. Play this one for your parents! 

Band Members Marcus Liotta; Producer, Vocals, Lyrics, Guitar, Bass, Drums, Keyboards, Samples. Justin "Paperboy" Sandifer; Vocals, Lyrics, Assistant to the Creative Consultant. Cameron Cartier; Vocals on nolimits, scorch, baddata, phantasm and spreadthin. Jenni L; Vocals, Lyrics on divide. Mason Louderback; Guest Vocals and Lyrics on who am i.
